mapper.select: select SERIAL_KEY, LIST_NAME, CODE, DESCRIPTION, SHORT_VALUE, LONG_VALUE, EDITABLE, ACTIVE, SEQUENCE, UDF1, UDF2, UDF3, UDF4, UDF5, UDF6, UDF7, NOTE, INS_DATE, INS_USER, UPD_DATE, UPD_USER from CODELKUP order by LIST_NAME, CODE

select SERIAL_KEY, LIST_NAME, CODE, DESCRIPTION, SHORT_VALUE, LONG_VALUE, EDITABLE, ACTIVE, SEQUENCE, UDF1, UDF2, UDF3, UDF4, UDF5, UDF6, UDF7, NOTE, INS_DATE, INS_USER, UPD_DATE, UPD_USER from CODELKUP where LIST_NAME = #{listName} AND CODE = #{code}
mapper.insert:
insert into CODELKUP (LIST_NAME, CODE, DESCRIPTION, SHORT_VALUE, LONG_VALUE, EDITABLE, ACTIVE, SEQUENCE, UDF1, UDF2, UDF3, UDF4, UDF5, UDF6, UDF7, NOTE, INS_DATE, INS_USER, UPD_DATE, UPD_USER) values
(#{cod.listName}, #{cod.code}, #{cod.description}, #{cod.shortValue}, #{cod.longValue}, #{cod.editable}, #{cod.active}, #{cod.sequence}, #{cod.udf1}, #{cod.udf2}, #{cod.udf3}, #{cod.udf4}, #{cod.udf5}, #{cod.udf6}, #{cod.udf7}, #{cod.note}, #{cod.insDate}, #{cod.insUser}, #{cod.updDate}, #{cod.updUser})

insert into CODELKUP (LIST_NAME, CODE, DESCRIPTION, SHORT_VALUE, LONG_VALUE, EDITABLE, ACTIVE, SEQUENCE, UDF1, UDF2, UDF3, UDF4, UDF5, UDF6, UDF7, NOTE, INS_DATE, INS_USER, UPD_DATE, UPD_USER) values (#{listName}, #{code}, #{description}, #{shortValue}, #{longValue}, #{editable}, #{active}, #{sequence}, #{udf1}, #{udf2}, #{udf3}, #{udf4}, #{udf5}, #{udf6}, #{udf7}, #{note}, #{insDate}, #{insUser}, #{updDate}, #{updUser})
mapper.update: update CODELKUP set LIST_NAME = #{listName}, CODE = #{code}, DESCRIPTION = #{description}, SHORT_VALUE = #{shortValue}, LONG_VALUE = #{longValue}, EDITABLE = #{editable}, ACTIVE = #{active}, SEQUENCE = #{sequence}, UDF1 = #{udf1}, UDF2 = #{udf2}, UDF3 = #{udf3}, UDF4 = #{udf4}, UDF5 = #{udf5}, UDF6 = #{udf6}, UDF7 = #{udf7}, NOTE = #{note}, UPD_DATE = #{updDate}, UPD_USER = #{updUser}

update CODELKUP set LIST_NAME = #{cod.listName}, CODE = #{cod.code}, DESCRIPTION = #{cod.description}, SHORT_VALUE = #{cod.shortValue}, LONG_VALUE = #{cod.longValue}, EDITABLE = #{cod.editable}, ACTIVE = #{cod.active}, SEQUENCE = #{cod.sequence}, UDF1 = #{cod.udf1}, UDF2 = #{cod.udf2}, UDF3 = #{cod.udf3}, UDF4 = #{cod.udf4}, UDF5 = #{cod.udf5}, UDF6 = #{cod.udf6}, UDF7 = #{cod.udf7}, NOTE = #{cod.note}, UPD_DATE = #{cod.updDate}, UPD_USER = #{cod.updUser} where LIST_NAME = #{listNameWhere} AND CODE = #{codeWhere}
mapper.delete: delete from CODELKUP where LIST_NAME = #{listName} AND CODE = #{code}
